Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to have you laughing like no other martial arts film ; It's actually the first martial arts film to have love as its theme. It is a story of a man who is living his life but also a man who is looking for true love. I'm a 90s
